mapper.select: SELECT rownums, id, application_date, begin_date, end_date, reason, state, attendance_cd_id FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as rownums, attendance.* FROM attendance ORDER BY id DESC )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attendance (id, application_date, begin_date, end_date, reason, state, attendance_cd_id) VALUES(#{id}, #{application_date}, #{begin_date}, #{end_date}, #{reason}, #{state}, #{attendance_cd_id})

INSERT INTO commute (id, work_date, begin_date, end_date, night_time, over_time, attendance_id, employee_id) VALUES(commute_seq.nextval, #{work_date}, #{begin_date}, #{end_date}, #{night_time}, #{over_time}, #{attendance_id}, #{employee_id})
